Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

abstract.p: Atty Gen Janet Reno says she will seek to determine delay in government review of Carnivore, new FBI computer system that can search and intercept private e-mail (S)

block.p: Attorney General Janet Reno said she would determine what was delaying a government review of a new F.B.I. computer system that can search and intercept private e-mail. The system, called Carnivore, enables federal agents to sort through large quantities of e-mail messages. Privacy and civil liberties groups have complained that the system enables the government to monitor an unlimited amount of e-mail, but the F.B.I. says it intends to monitor only the e-mail messages of criminal suspects. Ms. Reno called last month for a review of whether the system was being used ina manner consistent with privacy rights in the Constitution and federal law.
